traits.Keen Hearing and Smell: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
traits.Pack Tactics: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.Multiattack: The wolf makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d4 + 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d10 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16+1d4 + 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d4 + 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage.
